subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Football
Brain
Grants (Corporate and Foundation)
Research
organizations: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
lead_paragraph: The league will not help pay for a study to try to find a way to diagnose a degenerative brain disease, despite its potential implications for football players.
snippet: The league will not help pay for a study to try to find a way to diagnose a degenerative brain disease, despite its potential implications for football players.
